page.title: ServerlessDays ANZ - Stephen Sennett
page.description: Stephen Sennett is a cloud technology leader, content creator, educator, and speaker. He worked in the industry for over a decade across in a variety of roles. He holds high-level certifications across multiple technologies, has been recognized as an AWS Community Builder, spoken at numerous events, and authors technical content with A Cloud Guru (a Pluralsight company).

organiser.name: Stephen Sennett
organiser.title: Independent Consultant, and AWS Community Builder
